EnExplanation: The word 'ohtlik' refers to something that poses a threat or risk to safety or well-being.

Samples.EeSentence: See koht on ohtlik ja seal ei tohi mängida.
Samples.EnSentence: This place is dangerous and you should not play there.

Samples.EeSentence: See koht on ohtlik ja seal ei tohi joosta.
Samples.EnSentence: This place is dangerous and you must not run there.
